Content: The Grade-5 scholarship examination was held today at 2,995 examination centers. 399,369 students sat for the examination. The Examination Department announced that they set up 497 coordinating centers for the exam. Marking of the examination papers of the scholarship examination is scheduled to take place between 15th and 20th of this month. Students were seen enthusiastically going to examination centers in many areas of the country to sit for the scholarship exam, today.
